name: 2 Meter Looter
description:
Description

2 Meter Looter is simulating the experience of going to the store and trying to avoid everyone.

You will have to collect all the items that are on the To Buy list and, using the new Shopping Cart Scanner 2000, purchase them at the cash out.

Controls

- 'Left Click' and drag the shopping cart around.

- 'E' to interact with shelves and the shopping cart.

- 'Space' to toggle the To Buy list.
